text.textblock: Portion:
All.
Survey and Abstract No.:
F. F. McCafferty-37; A-396.
Portion:
Beginning at the Northwest corner of A-396; Thence, N. 88
’ E., 350 feet; Thence, Southeasterly, approximately 7500 feet, along the southerly gradient boundary of Village Creek; Thence, S. 86
’ W., 5550 feet, along the South line of A-396; Thence, N. 01
’ W., 1352.23 feet, to the Point of Beginning.
Also Beginning at the Northeast corner of A-396; Thence, S. 01
’ E., 300 feet; Thence Northwesterly, approximately 5500 feet, along the northerly gradient boundary of Village Creek; Thence, N. 88
’ E., 4550 feet, along the North line of A-396, to the Point of Beginning.
Survey and Abstract No.:
J. M. Swisher; A-631.
Portion:
Part of said A-631 described as follows: Beginning on the North line of said A-631 at a point which lies N. 84
’ W., 5650 feet, from the Northwest corner of said A-631; Thence, N. 84
’ E., 2800 feet, along the North line of A-631; Thence, Southeasterly, approximately 3000 feet, along the westerly gradient boundary of Village Creek; Thence, S. 88
’ W., 350 feet, along the North line of the F. McCafferty survey, A-396; Thence, S. 01
’ E., 1352.23 feet, along the easterly boundary of A-631; Thence, N. 55
’ W., 2650 feet; Thence, S. 86
’ W., 2950 feet, along the north line of the J. Lewis survey, A-365; Thence, N. 01
’ W., 350 feet, to the Point of Beginning.
Survey and Abstract No.:
G. R. Ferguson; A-678.
Portion:
Part of A-678 described as follows: Beginning on the North line of said A-678 at a point which lies S. 84
’ W., 3900 feet, from the Northeast corner of said A-678; Thence, S. 71
’ E., 2250 feet; Thence, S. 88
’ W., 1000 feet; Thence, Northwesterly, approximately 3000 feet, along the easterly gradient boundary of Village Creek; Thence, N. 84
’ E., 1500 feet, to the Point of Beginning.
Survey and Abstract No.:
L. De Lesslie; A-35.
Portion:
Part of said A-35 described as follows: Beginning on the south line of said A-35 at a point which lies S. 84
’ W., 7450 feet from the southeast corner of said A-35; Thence, S. 84
’ W., 1500 feet; Thence, Northwesterly, approximately 2000 feet, along the easterly gradient boundary of Village Creek; Thence, N. 66
’ E., 600 feet, along the southerly right-of-way line of Texas State Highway 327; Thence, S. 44
’ E., 1000 feet; Thence, S. 05
E., 500 feet; Thence, S. 71
E., 1550 feet, to the Point of Beginning.
Also Beginning on the South line of said A-35 at a point which lies N. 84
’ E., 6950 feet from the Southwest corner of said A-35; Thence, N. 07
’ E., 150 feet; Thence, N. 72
’ E., 250 feet; Thence, N. 07
’ W. 200 feet; Thence, N. 35
’ W., 250 feet; Thence, N. 00
’ W., 200 feet; Thence, N. 86
’ E., 400 feet; Thence, N. 04
’ W., 450 feet; Thence, N. 66
’ E., 1300 feet, along the South right-of-way line of Texas State Highway 327; Thence, Southeasterly, approximately 2000 feet, along the westerly gradient boundary of Village Creek; Thence S. 84
’ W., 2800 feet, to the Point of Beginning.
